item.title: Why I Made a Website
item.description: Short answer: why not? The longer answer is me waxing poetic. I’ve made a website long long ago, back in 2021.

item.title: An Update
item.description: Hi. Let’s see, my last post here was back in 28 Jan 2024. It’s been four months! I just finished polishing it up yesterday with some minor design changes.

item.title: About
item.description: I dunno who’d be interested enough to view this page — or heck, even this website — but if you truly are curious then feel free to scroll through all this meta stuff.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: I’m just starting out and making this cool new Hugo website as a blog teehee. This is called My First Post because that’s what the quickstart told me to call it :D.
